name: Cousin David's Slow Cooker Brisket
author: DRUMNWRITE
summary: This is a family recipe passed along by my late cousin David.  It is so simple...just four ingredients thrown in the slow cooker!  Not only is it great to come home to a hot delicious meal...your home will smell wonderful too!  It is great with the extra gravy spooned over egg noodles or mashed potatoes.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix
directions: Place the beef brisket into a slow cooker
In a medium bowl, mix together the chili sauce, onion soup mix, and garlic powder
Cover, and cook on the Low setting for 8 to 10 hours
Slice the brisket against the grain, and pour the gravy over the slices
